The emergency grants for prevention and control of SARS-CoV-2 of Guangdong province

funding-group.funding-statement: This study was approved by the Health Commission of Guangdong Province to use patientâ€™s specimen for this study. This study was funded by grants from The National Key Research and Development Program of China (2018YFC1200100), National Science and Technology Major Project (2018ZX10301403), the emergency grants for prevention and control of SARS-CoV-2 of Ministry of Science and Technology (2020YFC0841400) and Guangdong province (2020B111108001, 2018B020207013).
